Hero.title: Reiki in Zurich for Calm, Clarity, and Balance
Hero.subtitle: Private 1:1 Reiki sessions to release stress, settle the nervous system, and restore your inner rhythm.

About.title: A Gentle, Grounded Practice
About.stillnessDesc: You are guided into a slower pace where body and mind can settle, reset, and recover.
About.p1: Reiki is a Japanese energy practice that supports deep relaxation and emotional balance through calm, intentional touch or hands held just above the body.
About.p2: Each session is tailored to how you feel that day. We begin with a short check-in, then move into quiet, focused bodywork in a warm and private setting.
About.p3: Clients often leave feeling lighter, clearer, and more present. The goal is not quick fixes, but sustainable nervous-system support you can build on.

HowItWorks.title: How a Session Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: A simple, structured process so you always know what to expect.
HowItWorks.step1Desc: We discuss how you are feeling today, your goals, and any physical or emotional concerns.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: You remain fully clothed and lie comfortably on the treatment table while the space is prepared for stillness.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Hands are placed lightly on or just above specific areas to support release, regulation, and energetic flow.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: We close with a short debrief and practical aftercare suggestions for the next 24?48 hours.

Benefits.title: What Reiki Can Support
Benefits.subtitle: Effects vary by person, but these are the changes clients most often report after consistent sessions.

benefit1.title: Stress Reset
benefit1.desc: Deep relaxation helps lower physical and emotional tension accumulated from daily overload.

benefit2.title: Emotional Stability
benefit2.desc: Sessions can create more emotional space, making reactions softer and recovery faster.

benefit3.title: Better Sleep Quality
benefit3.desc: Many clients fall asleep faster, wake less often, and feel more restored in the morning.

benefit4.title: Pain & Tension Relief
benefit4.desc: Reiki may reduce the intensity of body discomfort and help release long-held muscular guarding.

benefit5.title: Clearer Thinking
benefit5.desc: As internal noise lowers, focus improves and decisions feel more grounded.

benefit6.title: Energy Recovery
benefit6.desc: Clients often report steady energy through the day instead of sharp spikes and crashes.

Benefits.disclaimer: Reiki is a complementary wellness practice and not a replacement for medical diagnosis or treatment.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Clear answers before your first session.
FAQ.q1: What is Reiki and how does it work?
FAQ.a1: Reiki is a Japanese energy practice where the practitioner uses gentle hand positions on or above the body. The process supports nervous-system regulation, deep relaxation, and the body?s natural recovery processes.
FAQ.q2: What should I expect during my first session?
FAQ.a2: We start with a short conversation, then you rest fully clothed on a treatment table for about 60 minutes. People commonly report warmth, heaviness, tingling, or a deep sense of calm.
FAQ.q3: How many sessions do I need?
FAQ.a3: Some people feel better after one session, but a series of 3 sessions usually gives a clearer and more stable result. We decide together based on your goals.
FAQ.q4: Is Reiki safe? Are there any side effects?
FAQ.a4: Reiki is non-invasive and considered low-risk. Occasionally people feel emotionally sensitive or tired for a short period afterward, which usually passes quickly.
FAQ.a5: No. Reiki complements medical care but does not replace diagnosis, treatment, or medical advice from a licensed professional.
FAQ.q6: How do I prepare for a session?
FAQ.a6: Wear comfortable clothing, avoid heavy meals right before the session, and drink water before and after. Arrive a few minutes early to settle in.
FAQ.q7: Do you offer online or distance Reiki sessions?
FAQ.a7: At the moment, sessions are held in person in Zurich to provide the most focused and grounded experience.
